name: Pair Dadeni
description:
The fairies of legend are not the bubbly creatures of whimsy they are seen as today. They are selfish. They are petty. They are peculiar.

And it is one unlucky mortal’s job to settle an argument between three of them.

Nia is a young woman plucked from the human realm, and whisked into Annwn: The Celtic Underworld. There, she encounters the head of a once-great ruler, three noble fae known as the Maiden, the King, and the Remnant, and the object of their desires: the Pair Dadeni, a cauldron able to bring the dead back to life. With the Pair Dadeni on its last legs, only one of the three fae will be able to use its power before its rendered unusable once more.

It is your job to explore the various territories belonging to the fae, and determine who is most worthy of using the Pair Dadeni’s power.

No pressure or anything.

Controls: 
Movement:  Arrow keys/Mouse Click
Interact: Z
Menu: X

Meriel Green (Lost_Carc0sa)
